name: Boundary Pass
description:
BOUNDARY PASS
(last updated: 10/21/2021)
Boundary Pass is an interactive suspense novel that follows the experiences of a park ranger in the winter of 2003. Set in an isolated mountain pass known for its body-count, you must struggle to keep the mountains from claiming another life.

Content warnings: unreality, suicidal ideation, and familial death.

Boundary Pass is still very much in development. It is not yet friendly to mobile, and has some other formatting issues. Please be patient with me as move the game into Twine,  as I'm still learning! Feedback is always welcome.

For more information, or to contact the author, check out the blog! If you'd like to support the author or the game, I have a Ko-Fi.
